resources.string: Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT) Bhopal is a prestigious institute of higher education located in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. Established in 2017, VIT Bhopal has quickly risen to become a top choice for students seeking a quality education in engineering and technology. With state-of-the-art facilities, a highly qualified faculty, and a commitment to experiential learning, VIT Bhopal provides a comprehensive educational experience that prepares its graduates for success in a variety of fields. The institute is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV) and is recognized by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).
Address : VIT Bhopal University Bhopal-Indore Highway Kothrikalan, Sehore Madhya Pradesh – 466114
250 acres of sprawling lush green Campus strategically located on the Indore – Bhopal Highway, the two cleanest cities in the country
CALTech – Collaborative and Active Learning through Technology
Fully Flexible Credit System (FFCS)TM empowers students with freedom to choose courses, faculty and pace of study
Sophisticated laboratories actively engage students in acquiring practical knowledge of industrial standards
